title: What is so compelling about cartoons and caricatures? - Quora

response.answer_text: Caricatures are art work where a Person's face is Hand drawn or Illustrated with certain striking characteristics are exaggerated in order to create a comic or grotesque effect in Cartoon based Look. Cartoons and caricatures simply attract readers as basically they cover some social issues in a humorous way. Which common people face in day to day life or which any ruling party have promised but failed to fulfill his promise. It is simple and can be understood easily in few secs, as the data is represented photographically and the reader or viewer don't have to go through all some lengthy written work. once's opinion can be easily reflected by seeing his caricature or cartoon. The only drawback which I feel is that, one's caricature can be misinterpreted by others and the main message behind the caricatures and cartoons fails to spread among people.
Because cartoons make you laugh and people want humorous amusement in it.
